name: Virtual Chef Cooking Game 3D
description:
Are you fond of making exotic food and yummiest cuisine? Or like to eat grill chicken burger and french fries? Play role of chef in kitchen and cook delicious cuisines for family and friends. Become world’s best chef and fill your craze for cooking. Begin cooking journey and cook delicious dishes to become the rising chef of restaurant game! Kitchen fever will start in this winter carnival, so are you ready for it?

Play role of chef in restaurant and cook delicious meals, Italian pizza, chicken and beef steak, burgers and sandwiches for customers. Take command on kitchen and demonstrate cooking skills, all you have to do is gather up all chefs’ ingredients, cook food in kitchen and fulfill the appetite of customers. Practice your cooking techniques and time management skills professionally in this game.
It will be a real cooking challenge for you, so beat your cooking competitors in cooking contest.

Ready yourself for this cooking challenging contest!

Features:
• Multiple challenging cooking levels!
• Amaze everyone with your cooking skills!
• Serve delicious food to customers!
• Test your cooking management and time management skills
• Best restaurant graphics and sound effects!

Challenge yourself as master chef, so, download this game and reward us your valuable feedback, so we can make more fun mania game for you.
